original_text: Take some horses for Paul to ride on. Take him to Felix the Roman ruler, and keep him safe on the journey.’
korean_text: 또 바울을 태워 총독 벨릭스에게로 무사히 보내기 위하여 짐승을 준비하라 명하며

sentences.original_text: Take some horses for Paul to ride on.
sentences.korean_translation: 바울이 탈 수 있도록 말 몇 필을 준비하십시오.

sentences.original_text: Take him to Felix the Roman ruler,
and keep him safe on the journey.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 여정 중에 그의 안전을 지키십시오.
